text: An online streamer or live streamer is an type of social media influencer who broadcasts themselves online through a live stream to an audience. There are different formats: * People show how they play video games. * People show themselves using a webcam, this is often done in the context of producing pornography; such people are known as webcam models]รถ. * People show their daily lives, walking around using a webcam. Very often, people use advertising, or product placement to generate some earnings. Sometimes, people also have a pay per view model. This is often the case for streaming in the context of producing pornography. == References == Category:Internet
title: Online streamer
